actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to increase the contract authority for the construction of a bridge across Markland Dam on the Ohio River near Markland, Ind., and Warsaw, Ky..

summary.text: Increases, from $16,761,000 to $19,261,000, the contract authority for the construction of a bridge across Markland Dam on the Ohio River near Markland, Indiana, and Warsaw, Kentucky.

titles.title: A bill to increase the contract authority for the construction of a bridge across Markland Dam on the Ohio River near Markland, Ind., and Warsaw, Ky..
